CAREER SUMMARY  
 
August 2018  to date Arkema ME  
Position: Area Sales Manager  
• Manage and achie ve growth of the molecular sieves / adsorbents business unit 
in the ME, India & Pakistan region in gas processing, refining & petrochemical 
industries.  
• Provide technical assistance that includes providing technical offers with 
designs, start -up assistanc e & first level trouble -shooting assistance.  
• Fore-casting the monthly & annual budget and ensure execution.  
• Implementation of the sales plan that includes negotiating sales agreements, 
Ensure proper internal reporting of sales activities (key customers  and area).  
 
March 2016 to Oct 2017 Star Group of Companies  
Position: Re gional Sales Manager  
Responsible for Sales and business development of drilling fluid products for the O&G 
and construction industries all over the gulf countries.  
Provide timely and proactive service to Customers, thereby actively contributing to 
achieve the  Goals and targets set.  
Advice clients and recommend the fluid system to be implemented based on soil strata 
and chemical contamination from the ground.  
 
Aug 201 3 to Dec 2015 Sc hlumberger USA  
Position: Technical Specialist  
• Determine cause of fluid, well -bore or system problems to assist in treatment 
recommendation.  
• Determine chemical treatments required to optimize drilling parameters.  
    
• Advise clients such as Oxy, Chevron, Aera Energy on potential treatments or 
improvements to the fluid system based on data analysis and mud testing.  
• Supervise rig personnel performi ng chemical additions and recording drilling 
fluid parameters.  
 
Feb 2012 to Aug 2013 Khuairi Group  
Position: Project Engineer  
• Procurement of various oil field equipment such as down -hole tools, drill -bits, 
Casing, drill -pipes, mud pumps etc involving technical and commercial 
negotiations  
• Engineering document review including vendor document review, technical 
queries, requisition for quotation.  
• Provide end -to-end technical support to the client throughout the drilling 
operation.  
• Maintain rel ationship with customers, internal service providers and service 
contractors to enable smooth and efficient progress of the Well Engineering 
Operations.  
 
Sept 2011 to Feb 2012 Halliburt on Energy Services  
Position: MWD Field Engineer  
• Assisting the Directional driller in drilling the well horizontally or through multiple 
reservoirs to maximize the potential of the well.  
• Provide technical consultation to all customers that includes mud hydraulics, 
Bottom Hole Assembly (BHA) planning, formation evaluation, drilling 
tendencies, the mud system and BHA dynamics.  
• Provide supervision fo r the MWD operation at the well site that ensures quality 
data provided to directional drillers and Customers.  
 
 
COMMENT  
 
Chemical / Petroleum Engineer with 11 years of diversified experience in Oil & Gas 
industry that includes experience in Technical Sales & business development in 
upstream O&G domain, gas processing, refining & Petrochemical industries.  
 
Software  / Simulation tools:  
Experience in HYSYS, PIPESIM, PVTsim and OLGA simulators  
 
For further information please contact Julie Smith  on 01695 570 696 or email 
Julie.smith @johnston -vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
